question: How many users signed up in the last 7 days?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as new_users FROM users WHERE created_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 7 DAY

question: What was total revenue yesterday?
sql: SELECT SUM(total_amount) as revenue FROM orders WHERE DATE(order_date) = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 DAY

question: Show top 10 customers by order value
column3: SUM(o.total_amount) as total_spent FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.id\
column4: u.email ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 10

question: How many active users do we have?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE status = 'active'

question: What is the average order value this month?
sql: SELECT AVG(total_amount) as avg_order FROM orders WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM order_date) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_DATE)

question: Show daily order count for last week
column3: COUNT(*) as orders FROM orders WHERE order_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 7 DAY GROUP BY DATE(order_date) ORDER BY date

question: Which products are selling best?
column3: COUNT(oi.id) as units_sold FROM products p JOIN order_items oi ON p.id = oi.product_id GROUP BY p.id\
column4: p.name ORDER BY units_sold DESC LIMIT 20

question: How many cancelled orders today?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders WHERE status = 'cancelled' AND DATE(order_date) = CURRENT_DATE

question: What is our user retention rate?
sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) as returning_users FROM orders WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM orders GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1)

question: Show revenue by product category
column3: SUM(o.total_amount) as revenue FROM products p JOIN order_items oi ON p.id = oi.product_id JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.id GROUP BY p.category ORDER BY revenue DESC
